T02D2226:79b-1: pradzny'a dzny'a na pra k'a sam /

T02D2226:83a-23: tshad mar blo sbyongs pa yis 'di dag rab tu bsngags pa yin ;
T02D2226:83a-25: de yang las kyi phyag rgya yan lag med par
T02D2226:83a-26: nyams su myong bar shes par nus pa ma yin
T02D2226:83a-27: no zhe na / 'di yang mdzes pa ma yin te /
T02D2226:83a-28: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur brjod kyi /
T02D2226:83a-29: de ni de kho na nyid ma yin no //
T02D2226:83a-30: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2226:83a-31: snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes la 'thad par 'gyur te /
T02D2226:83a-32: 'di ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa ste nyams su myong
T02D2226:83a-33: ba rten cing 'brel bar 'byang ba las rnam pa
T02D2226:83a-34: thams cad du snang ba yin no //
T02D2226:83a-35: kha sbyor ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med par yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:83a-36: bde ba chen po ni yod pa dang med pa
T02D2226:83a-37: la sogs pa'i rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir
T02D2226:83a-38: ro // rang bzhin med pa ni skye ba med pa'o //
T02D2226:83a-39: snying rjes nges pa gang ni snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:83a-40: rgyun mi 'chad pa ni rgyun gyi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:83b-0: @83b 'gag pa med pa ni chad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:83b-1: las kyi yan lag ma'i ye shes la ni khyad
T02D2226:83b-2: par can du gyur pa de dag yod pa ma
T02D2226:83b-3: yin no // gang yang tshe 'di nyid kyis sangs
T02D2226:83b-4: rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang nyid du 'gyur ro
T02D2226:83b-5: zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de yang bus pa'i
T02D2226:83b-6: tshig bzhin du snang bar 'gyur te /
T02D2226:83b-7: 'di ltar bsnyems pas kho bo ni rdo rje sems
T02D2226:83b-8: dpa'o zhes smras pa 'di rang nyid kyis rang la
T02D2226:83b-9: sems dang ldan pa rnams ci ste smod par byed
T02D2226:83b-10: / dper na shin tu blun po dag kho bo ni rgyal po'o zhes smra ba bzhin /
T02D2226:83b-11: rgyal po ma yin pa gcig pur ma zad kyi rlung can du yang smras pa ma yin nam /
T02D2226:83b-12: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las sngags la khyad par ma mthong ngo //
T02D2226:83b-13: 'di skad du brjod pa de yang ma yin te /
T02D2226:83b-14: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
T02D2226:83b-15: thabs mong dka' ba med pa dang //
T02D2226:83b-16: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
T02D2226:83b-17: sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags //
T02D2226:83b-19: chos rnams thams cad nyid kyi ni //
T02D2226:83b-20: dag pa de bzhin nyid du 'dod //
T02D2226:83b-21: ces sngags kyi theg pa las gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02D2226:83b-22: gnyis kas de bzhin sgrub par byed pas don gcig
T02D2226:83b-23: pa ni bden pa kho na ste ma rmongs pa'i
T02D2226:83b-24: gtan tshigs pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mtshungs
T02D2226:83b-25: pa'i phyir khyad par ci yod //
T02D2226:83b-26: 'dir rmongs pa'i skyes bu'i skyon yin nam /
T02D2226:83b-28: de la re zhig rang bzhin med par byed pa'i
T02D2226:83b-29: mtshan nyid can gyis theg pa la ni rmongs pa
T02D2226:83b-30: yod pa ma yin te gnyis ka la thal bar
T02D2226:83b-32: skyes bu don la mos pa'i rmongs pa yin no zhe na /
T02D2226:83b-33: de ltar 'dra mod kyi sngags kyi theg pa la yang skyes bu'i rmongs pa snang ba yin no //
T02D2226:83b-34: thabs mang ba nyid kyang 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i
T02D2226:83b-35: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2226:83b-39: mtshan nyid gsum bsgom pas kyang de bzhin nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:84a-0: dga' ba la sogs pa'i thabs khyad par kho na yod pas na chags pa la @84a * //
T02D2226:84a-1: 'jug pa tsam gyis ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D2226:84a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas

T02D2226:84a-4: po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag
T02D2226:84a-5: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2226:84a-6: 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
T02D2226:84a-7: // dka' ba med pa yang gnyi ga la mtshungs te /

T02D2226:84a-10: kyis rnam par dag ba rtogs pa'i phyir //

T02D2226:84a-12: dbang po rnon pos dbang byas pa yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
T02D2226:84a-13: gang gi phyir chos thams cad rkyen las skyes pa
T02D2226:84a-14: ni ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing mi 'gag
T02D2226:84a-15: pa'i phyir ro // dbang po rnon po nyid kyis mos pa byed kyi /
T02D2226:84a-16: dman pa dag gis ni ma yin no //
T02D2226:84a-17: gzhan yang rang rang gi ngo bo nyid las rnam
T02D2226:84a-18: par dpyad na pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan bcos
T02D2226:84a-19: kho na nges pa'i don yin pa'i phyir lhag par
T02D2226:84a-20: 'gyur ba ste / drang ba'i don ni gzhan dag yin no //
T02D2226:84a-22: gtsub shing la sogs pa las me byung ba 'am /
T02D2226:84a-23: pi wang las sgra byung ba bzhin du gzugs rnam par snang mdzad de ;
T02D2226:84a-24: de yang mi bskyod pa'i ming can gyi rnam par
T02D2226:84a-25: shes pas rgyas btab pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i
T02D2226:84a-27: yang dag par sna tshogs nyams su myong ba tsam gzod ma nas 'od gsal bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2226:84a-28: 'di ha cang spros pa la dga' bas bsdus pas chog gi//
T02D2226:84a-29: bkrus pa nyid bkru dgos pa'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid dgos pa med par 'gyur te /

T02D2226:84a-32: rgyab ces bya ba su yis bstan //
T02D2226:84a-33: dbu gtsug g-yas su 'khyil ba yang //
T02D2226:84a-34: lag pa bkyigs pas ston byed dam //
T02D2226:84a-36: gzhan yang gang las kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba 'dod
T02D2226:84a-37: pa de dag ni nyi tshe ba'i rnam par dag
T02D2226:84a-38: pa ste / phung po dang khams dang skye mched
T02D2226:84a-39: kyi rang bzhin can gyi shes rab kyis sbyang bar
T02D2226:84a-40: pa ste / bya'o // de dngos su dngos po
T02D2226:84a-41: thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid ci'i phyir goms
T02D2226:84b-0: pa ste / bya'o // par mi byed / 'on te 'dod chags @84b chen po'i theg pa 'dir /
T02D2226:84b-1: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pas zag
T02D2226:84b-2: pa med pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D2226:84b-4: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2226:84b-5: bde ba chen po rab sgrub phyir //
T02D2226:84b-6: sangs rgyas byang chub go 'phang mchog / bla med 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2226:84b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las kyang shin
T02D2226:84b-9: tu 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dod pa lnga la longs
T02D2226:84b-10: spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2226:84b-12: byed pa ma yin no zhe na de yang mdzes

T02D2226:84b-15: 'bring dang rab kyi dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin no //
T02D2226:84b-16: de la dman pa dang 'bring la 'di dag bstan pa yin gyi /
T02D2226:84b-17: rab dmigs pa med pa la spyod pa rnams kyis
T02D2226:84b-18: ni 'phags pa chos 'phags bzhin bag tsha ba med
T02D2226:84b-19: par bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang
T02D2226:84b-20: lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga rnams la
T02D2226:84b-21: rol pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod
T02D2226:84b-22: pas spangs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:84b-23: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par byung bar bstan la /
T02D2226:84b-25: 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin zhing ;
T02D2226:84b-26: / bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2226:84b-27: ma rig pas yid bslad ba rnams 'di ltar mngon par zhen pa /

T02D2226:84b-29: gsal bar byed pa'i zla bas bde ba byed pa
T02D2226:84b-30: de dag kyang skar mdas kyang gdung bar byed pa
T02D2226:84b-31: bzhin du kho bo cag ni bred pa yang med
T02D2226:84b-32: la dga' ba yang med de /
T02D2226:84b-33: de bas gnyis ka nyams par 'gyur bas grang ba yang med cing dra ba yang med do //
T02D2226:84b-34: don dam pa kun du rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:84b-35: 'o na bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin gang yin zhe na /
T02D2226:84b-36: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni /
T02D2226:84b-37: 'dod chags can 'dul ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan te /

T02D2226:84b-39: las kyi phyag rgya dang bral na //
T02D2226:84b-40: phyag rgya chen po yod ma yin //
T02D2226:84b-41: rang gi tshig la nyams dga' ba //
T02D2226:84b-42: rtog ldan gus par mi 'os te //
T02D2226:85a-2: med na phyag rgya chen po min //
T02D2226:85a-4: de bas na las kyi phyag la sogs pa'i sgom
T02D2226:85a-5: pa yang gzod ma nas dag pa nyid de rgyu
T02D2226:85a-6: dang 'bras bu'i bye brag de sems can 'jug pa'i
T02D2226:85a-7: phyir brjod kyi / phyag rgya chen po'i bye brag gis //
T02D2226:85a-8: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs gnas //
T02D2226:85a-9: phyag rgya chen po ma gtogs par //
T02D2226:85a-10: nam yang las la sogs pa med //
T02D2226:85a-11: de kho na nyid la 'jug ba las kyang /
T02D2226:85a-12: las kyi phyag rgya sogs bsgom pa //
T02D2226:85a-13: phyi ma phyi ma mchog yin te //
T02D2226:85a-14: de phyir snga ma spang bar bya //
T02D2226:85a-15: bla ma dam pa 'di ltar gnas ;
T02D2226:85a-17: de kho na dam pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2226:85a-18: chad pa ma yin nam zhe na //
T02D2226:85a-19: de dag ni rig pa ma yin te /
T02D2226:85a-20: rkyen las skyes pa rten 'brel nyid ni skye ba med pa ste /
T02D2226:85a-23: de nyid rang bzhin med par 'dod //
T02D2226:85a-24: de lta bu ni dam chos te //
T02D2226:85a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang mtshungs //
T02D2226:85a-27: gzhan yang gang zhig rten cing 'brel pa mthong ba de ni chos mthong ba ste /
T02D2226:85a-28: gang gi chos mthong ba de bla na med pa'i
T02D2226:85a-29: sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs

T02D2226:85a-31: gang gis rten cing 'byung ba shes //
T02D2226:85a-32: des ni chos nyid 'di rtogs la //
T02D2226:85a-33: gang gis chos nyid shes pa ni //
T02D2226:85a-34: de yis stong nyid de rtogs so //
T02D2226:85a-35: gang gis stong par shes gyur pa //
T02D2226:85a-36: de dag 'dren par mthong ba yin //
T02D2226:85a-38: rten cing 'brel pa de yang nyams su myong ba ste //
T02D2226:85a-39: mtha' yas bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2226:85a-40: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2226:85a-41: de yang yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhal snga nas kyang /
T02D2226:85a-42: mtha' yas bde ba'i ngo bo'i phyir //
T02D2226:85a-43: dpal ldan bde mchog ces bya'o ;
T02D2226:85a-45: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i rnam pa ma lus pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni /
T02D2226:85a-46: rmi lam dang dri za'i grong khyer bzhin snang ba yin gyi rtag pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2226:85a-47: dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:85b-0: @85b dri tha'i grong khyer bzhin du gsal //
T02D2226:85b-1: sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis mi gnas //
T02D2226:85b-2: nam mkha'i me tog lta bu'ang min //
T02D2226:85b-4: de lta bas na lhun gyis grub pa zung du
T02D2226:85b-5: 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyu ni rten cing
T02D2226:85b-6: 'brel par 'byung ba sna tshogs pa ni /
T02D2226:85b-7: bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba ste /
T02D2226:85b-8: gzod ma nyid nas rang bzhin med pa nyid du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2226:85b-11: sna tshogs sems ni gnyis su med //

T02D2226:85b-13: chos dang longs spyod sprul pa nyid //
T02D2226:85b-15: de la gang zhig gis stong ba nyid 'ba' zhig gam /
T02D2226:85b-17: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang stong ba tha mi dad pa'am /
T02D2226:85b-20: btang snyoms kyi rnam pa can gyis sgom par byed
T02D2226:85b-21: ba de dag gis ni nam yang bde ba chen
T02D2226:85b-22: po'i ngo bo nyid grub pa ma yin te /
T02D2226:85b-23: dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa med par bde
T02D2226:85b-24: ba'i rnam pa can nyid mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro
T02D2226:85b-25: // de med par ne bde ba chen po'i ngo
T02D2226:85b-26: bo nyid can gyi longs spyod pa'i sku 'grub par
T02D2226:85b-28: 'di ltar gang rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs bzhin du phung po dang /
T02D2226:85b-29: khams dang skye mched kyi bye brag thabs dang shes
T02D2226:85b-30: rab bsgom pa rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid chen
T02D2226:85b-31: po'i bde ba'i ye shes rtogs pas de bsgom par

T02D2226:85b-37: shes bsgoms pas bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2226:85b-38: kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub par
T02D2226:85b-39: 'gyur gyi / rtog pa thams cad spangs pas bde
T02D2226:85b-40: ba cung zad tsam yang nyams su myong ba ma

T02D2226:85b-44: de kho na nyid dang 'bras bu'i rgyu mtshan rtogs pa ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur /
T02D2226:85b-46: gnyen po'i phyogs la mi gnas shing //
T02D2226:86a-0: @86a * // de nyid la yang ma zhen gang //
T02D2226:86a-1: 'bras bu la ni srid min par //
T02D2226:86a-2: phyag rgya chen po de yis mthong //
T02D2226:86a-4: de ni gdon mi za bar yid brtan pa'am /
T02D2226:86a-5: g-yo bar 'gyur yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dogs pa med par brten par bya ste /
T02D2226:86a-6: de nas nyon mongs pa yang ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o snyam du sems pas /
T02D2226:86a-7: nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa med do //
T02D2226:86a-9: byang chub nyon mongs las gzhan min //
T02D2226:86a-10: nyon mongs byang chub las mi 'byung //
T02D2226:86a-11: 'khrul pas nyon mongs rtogs pa ste //
T02D2226:86a-12: 'khrul pas ngo bo dri ma med //
T02D2226:86a-14: de lta bu la ni nyon mongs pa'i glags skabs med de //
T02D2226:86a-15: rnal 'byor gyi kun rdzob kyis so so'i skye bo'i kun rdzob la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:86a-16: dge ba ni rtag tu goms pas sems can gyi
T02D2226:86a-17: don du byang chub sems bskyed pa nyid kyis yid
T02D2226:86a-18: bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod
T02D2226:86a-19: pa'i don la 'jug par byed pas na nyams par
T02D2226:86a-20: mi 'gyur ro // gzhan yang rang bzhin med pa la mos kyang /
T02D2226:86a-21: gal te 'jigs shing bag tsha ba 'byung na yang /
T02D2226:86a-22: de'i tshe ji bzhin pa'i don rtogs par mi bya ste /
T02D2226:86a-24: nyan thos rnal 'byor skom pas gdungs //

T02D2226:86a-26: theg pa chen po 'jigs shing skrag / nyon mongs lnga dag sngags kyi tshul //
T02D2226:86a-28: de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs la de lta de ltar brjod na yang /
T02D2226:86a-29: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa med par de lta bur gyur pa rtog pa dang bral ba /
T02D2226:86a-30: yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du byed pa ma yin no //
T02D2226:86a-31: gzhan yang ae ma'o skye bo 'di dag ni phyin
T02D2226:86a-32: ci log gis bcom pas rang gi bdag nyid mya
T02D2226:86a-33: ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi lha'i rang

T02D2226:86a-36: ji bzhin pa'i lha'i nga rgyal can shing thun rnams
T02D2226:86a-37: dang brtsad par mi rigs kyi snying rje bar 'os
T02D2226:86a-38: so // de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
T02D2226:86a-39: sems can gti mug chen po'i rab rib kyis bcom
T02D2226:86b-0: pa rnams la rnam par gzigs nas @86b snying rje

T02D2226:86b-6: 'gro rnams rgyal ba'i bdag nyid ma yin nam //
T02D2226:86b-7: rang nyid ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma med pa ste //
T02D2226:86b-8: 'on kyang shin tu byis pa'i tshul can te //
T02D2226:86b-9: 'dir seng ge phru gu dogs pa chung bas rang gi mthu stobs mi shes na yang /
T02D2226:86b-10: gzhan pha rol gzhom pa'i nus pa yod pa bzhin //
T02D2226:86b-11: skye bo zhal gcig la lag pa gnyis dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyi /

T02D2226:86b-13: phyag gnyis pa rdo rje can yang ma yin no //
T02D2226:86b-14: blang zhing dor ba cung zad ma yin te //
T02D2226:86b-15: byad kyi rang bzhin legs mthong byang chub yin //
T02D2226:86b-16: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang mi 'gal bar rang byin gyis brlab pa bsgoms nas /

T02D2226:90a-25: gang yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i rtog pa
T02D2226:90a-26: dang bral ba zhes zer ba de ni bden te
T02D2226:90a-27: / kho bo cag ni mchog dang dga' bral dag
T02D2226:90a-28: gi dbus su rang gi rig pa grub pa la
T02D2226:90a-29: / / sdug bsngal lam bde bar rtogs pa ma yin no //
T02D2226:90a-31: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D2226:90a-32: dbu mar dmigs pa mi 'gyur te /
T02D2226:90a-33: gsum po spangs pa de nyid ni //
T02D2226:90a-34: lhan cig skyes pa'i byang chub 'dod //
T02D2226:90a-36: 'on kyang kun du rtog pa med pas rang gi
T02D2226:90a-37: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba grub pa yang med
T02D2226:90a-38: do zhes gang smras pa de mngon sum du 'gal
T02D2226:90a-39: ba ste chad par smra bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i
T02D2226:90a-40: phyir ro // de skad du yang /
T02D2226:90a-41: rang rig mi rtog ye shes su //
T02D2226:90a-42: gal te spyod par byed na ni //
T02D2226:90a-43: sangs rgyas ye shes dag pa min //
T02D2226:90a-44: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
T02D2226:90a-46: dpal mda' bsnun gyi zhal snga nas kyang //
T02D2226:90a-47: rtog pa zhi bas blo de'ang zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D2226:90a-48: blo gros dman pa kha cig smra zhes grags //
T02D2226:90b-0: blo @90b bzang nyid ni blangs na ci yang rung //
T02D2226:90b-1: mkha' las lhag par ci ste mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2226:90b-2: rtog pa thams cad bcos par gyur pa'i blo //
T02D2226:90b-3: gang yin de ni bde ba dam par gsal //
T02D2226:90b-4: de ni bya ba byas pa mkhas pa ste //
T02D2226:90b-5: gzhan pa gang de rkang gnyis phyugs yin no //
T02D2226:90b-7: / gzhan dag 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba gang yin
T02D2226:90b-8: pa'i don du 'di bstan gyi de kho na nyid
T02D2226:90b-10: de ni sangs rgyas pa'i tshig ma yin no //
T02D2226:90b-11: 'dod chags can 'dul ba'i don du ni 'dod chags chen po bstan par mi rigs te /
T02D2226:90b-12: de dag gis 'dod chags zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2226:90b-13: mi sdug pa bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na
T02D2226:90b-15: gtso bo mnyam par dgod par mdzad //
T02D2226:90b-16: chags bral chags pa bar ma la //
T02D2226:90b-18: de'i theg pa ni gcig nyid de //
T02D2226:90b-20: / bstan pa yang ni gcig pu ste //
T02D2226:90b-23: de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis //
T02D2226:90b-24: gang phyir theg pa gcig cing tshul yang gcig /'dren pas bstan pa 'di yang gcig pa ste //
T02D2226:90b-25: gang yang theg pa gsum du bstan pa ni ;
T02D2226:90b-26: nga yi thabs la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2226:90b-29: ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar //
T02D2226:90b-30: theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med //
T02D2226:90b-31: sems ni yongs su gyur pa ni /
T02D2226:90b-32: theg pa med cing 'gro ba 'ang med //
T02D2226:90b-34: gzhan yang nor bu dang sngags dang sman gyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
T02D2226:90b-35: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa yang gang zhig
T02D2226:90b-36: thob nas tshe 'di nyid la mchog gi dngos grub
T02D2226:90b-37: thob par 'gyur te bde ba'i lha bzhin du 'gyur
T02D2226:90b-38: ro // lam 'di ring du bgrod pa ste //
T02D2226:90b-39: rtog ge skam po'i bya dag gis //
T02D2226:90b-40: blo yi rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gram //
T02D2226:90b-41: mtha' yas mthong nas song ba ldog / blo yi yul min de kho na //
T02D2226:90b-42: skye ba med pa rkyen las skyes //
T02D2226:90b-43: sna tshogs de ni rang rig ste //
T02D2226:90b-44: bla ma dam pa med par min //
T02D2226:90b-45: gsang sngags theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D2226:90b-46: bla ma dam pa skya ba 'dzin //
T02D2226:91a-1: skye bo dag / nyon mongs rgya mtsho rgal bar mthong //
T02D2226:91a-2: de la sngags kyi theg pa chen po bstan pa ni gnyis te /
T02D2226:91a-3: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2226:91a-4: bskyed pa'i rim pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2226:91a-5: phyi rol bskyed pa'i rim pa dang zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa'o ;
T02D2226:91a-6: / rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gsum ste /
T02D2226:91a-9: ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa'o //
T02D2226:91a-10: rnam pa lnga po de dag ni rim pa gnyis su so sor mngon par sbyar ro //
T02D2226:91a-11: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bdag med ma gsal ba las bstan pa ste /
T02D2226:91a-12: ji skad du gsungs pa'i bdag med ma'i 'khor lo
T02D2226:91a-13: bsgom pa yang bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas
T02D2226:91a-14: kyi bka' drin las khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2226:91a-15: de yang gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so //
T02D2226:91a-16: rdzogs pa'i rim ba gang zhe na /
T02D2226:91a-17: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi don du /
T02D2226:91a-18: dgod pa dag la slob dpon te //
T02D2226:91a-19: de bzhin lta ba gsang ba nyid //
T02D2226:91a-20: lag bcangs pas ni shes rab ste //
T02D2226:91a-21: de yang gnyis 'khyud rgyu yin no //
T02D2226:91a-22: zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa dang /
T02D2226:91a-23: gzhan nas kyang dbang bskur ba drug ni de bzhin
T02D2226:91a-24: gshegs pas dbugs dbyung ba'o zhes gsungs pas phyi rol
T02D2226:91a-27: las kyi phyag rgya ma'i ye shes ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs dbyur ba'o //
T02D2226:91a-28: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2226:91a-29: ngo bo nyid kyi bde ba gang thob pa de
T02D2226:91a-30: nyid 'di yin zhes pas mthong ba gang yin pa'o
T02D2226:91a-31: // skad cig la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje
T02D2226:91a-32: chen pos mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir gzung ba
T02D2226:91a-33: dang 'dzin pa nyams na mchog tu bde ba nyid
T02D2226:91a-34: // du brjod do // sngon po la sogs pa'i
T02D2226:91a-35: rnam pa can gyi chos rnams thams cad kyi phyag
T02D2226:91a-36: rgya ni sngom pa ste ro gcig pa'o //
T02D2226:91a-37: ngo bo nyid ma yin pa yang ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
T02D2226:91a-38: chos kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do //
T02D2226:91a-39: dga' bal sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang /
T02D2226:91a-40: 'dir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa bsten pa las shes par bya ste /
T02D2226:91a-41: bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas kyang /
T02D2226:91b-0: las kyi phyag rgya @91b rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
T02D2226:91b-1: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni yongs su grub pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D2226:91b-2: sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang
T02D2226:91b-3: thabs kyi bdag nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la
T02D2226:91b-4: sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i dgyes
T02D2226:91b-6: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2226:91b-8: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gsal ba gang
T02D2226:91b-9: yin pa de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste
T02D2226:91b-10: / dga' ba la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag
T02D2226:91b-11: rgya bzhin bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las rtogs
T02D2226:91b-13: las kyi phyag rgya nyid bzhin du //
T02D2226:91b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2226:91b-15: ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa yang gang kun du bzang por gyur pa ste /
T02D2226:91b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi khyad par las /
T02D2226:91b-17: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis 'bad pa med
T02D2226:91b-18: par skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub
T02D2226:91b-19: pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T02D2226:91b-20: 'di phyag rgya chen po zhes brjod do //
T02D2226:91b-21: chen po yang yin zhing phyag rgya thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2226:91b-22: de nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab pas
T02D2226:91b-23: thams cad kyis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang
T02D2226:91b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D2226:91b-26: lhan cig skyes pa brjod du med //
T02D2226:91b-28: phyag rgya chen bo ni brtag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi /
T02D2226:91b-29: lung bstan par sla ba ni ma yin pas 'dir dpyad par mi bya'o //
T02D2226:91b-31: zhes shes rab rgyal bas kyang mi dpyod do //
T02D2226:91b-32: 'on kyang de yi bdag nyid ni //
T02D2226:91b-33: de nyid 'di yin snyam du gsal //
T02D2226:91b-34: blang dang dor bas stong pa'i phyir //
T02D2226:91b-35: bdag cag lta bu mi brtan pas //
T02D2226:91b-36: bskal pa bya ba brgyar brtags kyang //
T02D2226:91b-37: mi rtogs ji ltar rnam rtog pa //
T02D2226:91b-38: byang chub nye ba ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2226:91b-39: dpyod pa min pa'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2226:91b-40: chos nyid de bzhin nyid sna tshogs //
T02D2226:91b-41: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa //
T02D2226:91b-42: snying rje bdag nyid blangs pa ni //
T02D2226:91b-43: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D2226:91b-44: byang chub bla ma bsten pa las //
T02D2226:91b-45: de phyir bla ma dam pa'i zhabs //
T02D2226:92a-2: dngos por 'khrul pa'i mun pa ni //
T02D2226:92a-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa'i zhabs kyi ni //
T02D2226:92a-5: padma'i rdul gyi bka' drin nyid thob pas //
T02D2226:92a-6: mngon sum pa yi lam son ji lta bzhin //
T02D2226:92a-7: thos pa'i lam las gnas pa gang yin pa //
T02D2226:92a-8: srid dang zhi ba ro mnyam par rig stong nyid de la 'dud //
T02D2226:92a-9: ma 'ongs ba yi de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni bdag gis bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2226:92a-10: gang gis sems nyid glog gi 'od bzhin gsal gyur pa //
T02D2226:92a-11: dge ba'i lus can bsten bya de yi zhabs kyi padma gnyis //
T02D2226:92a-12: rab tu gus pas thang cig tsam yang spyi bos len pa yin //
T02D2226:92a-13: bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul nas rin chen 'od 'bar ba //
T02D2226:92a-14: yid kyi mun pa 'joms par skad cig tsam gyis byed //
T02D2226:92a-15: rnam pa thams cad kyis brgyan de bzhin nyid 'di ni //
T02D2226:92a-16: 'jig rten 'di dag kun gyis mthong gyur cig /
T02D2226:92a-17: theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags thams cad dang 'brel
T02D2226:92a-18: pa // bla ma dam pas bstan pa nyams su myong ba ni //
T02D2226:92a-19: gang zhig bdag gi sa bstan pa'i dge ba bsags pa des //
T02D2226:92a-20: 'gro ba thams cad rgyal ba mchog gi go 'phang
T02D2226:92a-21: thob par shog / shes rab ye shes gsal ba
T02D2226:92a-22: 'di // sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D2226:92a-23: dam pa'i lam ni thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2226:92a-24: mkhas pa padma rdo rjes byas //
T02D2226:92a-25: shes rab ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2226:92a-26: mkhas pa chen po de ba tsandra'i zhal snga nas mdzad ba rdzogs so /
T02D2226:92a-28: // / bandi ta badzra p'a ni dang /
